data.boring_theme: going to the petrol station to pump diesel into a vehicle
data.output: I made it a few miles down the road before I heard that terrible noise. The car rolled to a stop by the side of the road and I realised my mistake. I'd put diesel in my petrol car! They were right beside each other at the pump. Now the long wait for the recovery man, how embarrassing!

data.boring_theme: putting a stamp on the envelop containing a letter to send it
data.output: It was results day, I studied so hard with my friend Ben. The teacher passed out the exam papers. When mine was placed in front of me I saw it was stamped with a large letter 'A'. I took my phone out under the desk to send Ben a message with the good news.

data.boring_theme: having an organ empire and complying with regulations
data.output: The Empire Theatre was a classic. It was fitted with beautiful, original Art Deco features and an organ set by the stage. It wouldn't comply with any of today's building regulations but I don't think anyone would want to change it.

data.boring_theme: the feeling of gloom you have about an existing payment
data.output: Ben saw the figure come out of the gloom. He approached and Ben discreetly passed him the payment. The figure reciprocated by passing Ben the envelope before walking off into the mist. A moment later he was gone, as if he never existed.
